name: Invictus Leadership Consulting
description: You have goals. I’ll be helping you to enrich them so you can more clearly envision what success looks like for you – which often ends up being more than status within your sport or discipline. By the end of our time together, you’ll have learned tools and concepts which promote leadership capabilities and elite performance. I’ve built a course that develops personal leadership. The course is rooted in the principles of character education, military training and corporate consulting. I’ll provide you with a systematic and strategic progression to evolve perspective and pattern of action. Our goal is to generate consistent elite performance with sustainable return.
features: Consistent elite performance with sustainable return.
business_objectives: Build a More Diverse and Inclusive Workforce
Headline:
ENRICH
 YOUR GOALS
ShortDescription: You have goals. I’ll be helping you to enrich them so you can more clearly envision what success looks like for you – which often ends up being more than status within your sport or discipline.
enhanced_description: Invictus Leadership Consulting offers a specialized program designed to help individuals and organizations enrich goals, clearly envision success, and develop robust personal leadership capabilities. Rooted in principles of character education, military training, and corporate consulting, the service leverages the proprietary 'Invictus Leadership Performance Model'. The core objective is to generate consistent elite performance with sustainable return. As a Talent Management and Workforce Management solution, it directly supports business objectives such as building a more diverse and inclusive workforce and improving employee happiness and engagement.
key_use_cases: Evolving perspective and patterns of action for sustained success
Fostering a more diverse and inclusive workforce
competitive_advantages: Utilizes the proprietary Invictus Leadership Performance Model
Methodology rooted in character education, military training, and corporate consulting principles
Focus on systematic and strategic progression
Aims for consistent elite performance with sustainable return
roi_benefits: Contributes to building a more diverse and inclusive workforce
primary_users: Organizations aiming to improve leadership capabilities
Companies focused on enhancing employee happiness and engagement
Organizations committed to fostering workforce diversity and inclusion
